Key.Original: Policeman dies when has no ammo
Key.English: Policeman dies when has no ammo
Key.Polish: Czy policjant ma umrzeć gdy skończy mu się amunicja

Key.Original: All players and policemen are dead
Key.English: All players and policemen are dead

Key.Original:
- player may change objects he is hiding in
- policeman should listen to all sounds and its directions
- things you may change in MISSION PARAMETERS:
- game area ( there are few to choose from )
- policeman's weapons, optics and ammo count
- time limit
- radio system for spectators
Key.English:
- player may change objects he is hiding in
- policeman should listen to all sounds and its directions
- things you may change in MISSION PARAMETERS:
- game area ( there are few to choose from )
- policeman's weapons, optics and ammo count
- time limit
- radio system for spectators
Key.Polish:
- gracz może zmieniać obiekty, w których się ukrywa
- policjant powinien nasłuchiwać skąd dochodzą dźwięki
- opcje, które możesz zmienić w PARAMETRACH MISJI:
- strefa gry ( jest kilka do wyboru )
- broń, optykę i ilość amunicji policjanta
- limit czasu
- system radiowy dla obserwatorów

Key.Original:
1. There are two teams : policemen (max 2) and players (max 30).
Players are invisible and hiding in objects.

2. Policeman's goal is to kill all players.
Policeman dies when he runs out of ammo.

3. Player's goal is to collect points by reaching place
marked by a stack of arrows. Each player has it's own arrows
and arrows are visible only to him.

4. Player dies when he will try to leave area surrounded by road cones.

5. Mission ends when:
- there is no more players
- there is no more policemen
- the time is up

6. Player with best score - wins
Key.English:
1. There are two teams : policemen (max 2) and players (max 30).
Players are invisible and hiding in objects.

2. Policeman's goal is to kill all players.
Policeman dies when he runs out of ammo.

3. Player's goal is to collect points by reaching place
marked by a stack of arrows. Each player has it's own arrows
and arrows are visible only to him.

4. Player dies when he will try to leave area surrounded by road cones.

5. Mission ends when:
- there is no more players
- there is no more policemen
- the time is up

6. Player with best score - wins
Key.Polish:
1. W grę grają dwa zespoły : policjanci (max 2) i gracze (max 30).
Gracze są niewidzialni i ukrywają się w przedmiotach.

2. Zadaniem policjanta jest zastrzelenie wszystkich graczy.
Policjant umiera gdy skończy mu się amunicja.

3. Zadaniem gracza jest zbieranie punktów w miejscach oznaczonych
kolumną utworzoną ze strzałek. Każdy gracz ma własną kolumnę strzałek
i tylko on widzi własne kolumny strzałek.

4. Gracz ginie, gdy opuści teren gry otoczony pachołkami drogowymi.

5. Misja kończy się gdy:
- nie ma więcej graczy
- nie ma więcej policjantów
- upłynie czas gry

6. Wygrywa gracz z największą ilością punktów
